name: Kyuramen - Forest Hills
address: 108-50 Queens Blvd, Forest Hills, NY 11375, USA

reviews.text: I stopped by Kyuramen and ordered the Curry Ramen and an Iced Thai Tea, and both really hit the spot. The curry ramen had a rich, flavorful broth and savory with just the right amount of spice. The noodles were perfectly chewy, and the tender slices of pork soaked up the curry flavor nicely. It‚Äôs a comforting bowl that balances warmth and spice without being overwhelming. The Iced Thai Tea was creamy and refreshing, with that signature sweet, slightly earthy flavor that pairs perfectly with a salty, savory dish. The atmosphere was cozy with a modern Japanese feel which is great for solo dining or a casual hangout. Service was quick and friendly, and everything came out fresh and hot. Overall, Kyuramen delivered a satisfying, flavorful meal that I‚Äôd definitely order again especially on a cold day!
Food and service was amazing!
Good service!! Win a free popcorn chicken
Love the place!!! Great venue. Food is amazing.
Love tokyo tonkotsu shoyu ramen!!!
Very good and clean!!

It was my first time trying ramen, and it really met my expectations! Great menu options and excellent prices. The service could be a bit friendlier, but the food was absolutely delicious. Totally worth it!
Good ramen in queens
Delicious ramen. Chashu had a nice charred taste :)
Delicious food and great service!
The food here was amazing 10/10 ramen
The service is impeccable, I always loved this place, great food!!
Amazing lemonade is delicious with a hint of cucumber. Yummy ramen. Will be back
Favorite spot in Forest Hills. Food is always good.
Solid ramen
food is so comforting! and really great ramen for prices! you get a good amount!
Delicious! Ramen was AMAZING service was also great. We got our waters the sec we sat down and we got our food about 8 mins after we ordered. Would recommended
We like this place a lot  the food Is pretty good and the kids love coming here
Friendly service and clean environment. Very kid friendly and good options are great and fairly priced, especially for forest hills
amazing food
Food came fast and servers were friendly! Also, the restaurant is very gorgeous! I went on a date night here and we had a lovely time. The prices are pretty good too!
I love the the YinYang ramen, it came with 2 flavors! The atmosphere and service there are also great üëç
Great food, amazing service. Servers were very quick to attend and helpful!
Very good service and food
Love this place i always get the curry ramen and takoyaki. Today i got the chili dumplings and they were soo good.

I went to Kyuramen in Forest Hills recently, and honestly, it was such a good experience. The food was amazing‚Äîsuper flavorful and fresh. The ramen broth had that perfect balance of richness without being too heavy, and the noodles were cooked just right.

The place itself is really nice and clean, with a cozy vibe that makes it great for both a quick meal or hanging out with friends. The staff were also really friendly and attentive‚Äîthey checked in just the right amount without being overbearing, which I appreciate.

Overall, Kyuramen‚Äôs definitely one of my new favorite ramen spots in Queens. Highly recommend if you‚Äôre craving something warm and delicious!
Excellent service
Good experience and food. Great service!
Super nice atmosphere and really good ramen!
Good food and cozy vibes
Good vibes and good food.
Unique layout to the restaurant, fast service, and delicious drinks
I love this location! Staff is so nice and attentive. The bowls are always made to perfection and have such an authentic taste! Always come here with friends to chat and have a tasty meal.
Good food, good ramen, nice place.
Good food and experience
Excelente servicio üëç  üòãüòãüòãüòãüòãüòãüòãüòã
The ambiance is really nice ,last time I was here i try the sweet potato cake is was amazing

Oh my gosh, this place is amazing. I recently just went here and the ramen was so good, service quick and easy. I highly recommend going here if you‚Äôre looking for somewhere affordable but also filling! I def will be coming back again! üíì

This location is amazing! The service is very efficient and workers are very attentive to their customers. The design of the honey comb seating really elevates the experience. Not to mention how good the food is!! Try the steak ramen! Will be coming back soon.
so yummy and pretty inside! their kyushu spicy tonkatsu ramen is my fave !!
The service was good
Come here very often and recommend my family to come too because the food has been very delicious and has met my expectations always. If you are around the area come try it !

Kyuramen offers a fantastic dining experience! The ramen is delicious, with rich broth and perfectly cooked noodles that create a comforting and satisfying meal. The variety of toppings allows for customization, catering to all tastes. The atmosphere is inviting, making it a great spot for both casual dining and special occasions. Plus, the staff is friendly and attentive, adding to the overall positive experience. I highly recommend Kyuramen to anyone looking for authentic and flavorful ramen!
It was good the service was quick and good was amazing!
Food was very delicious, would definitely recommend this place to anyone near the area because the food was spot on.

Got seated in no time at all even when really busy! Each table gas chargers which was great because my phone was on its last legs. They have little call buttons in the booth so more awkward interactions to try and call your waiter. Thai iced tea is to die for and the beef ramen was amazing. 10/10 will come again.
The food was amazing and service was great!
I really like this place! The atmosphere is really nice and it isn't really crowded. The food and drinks are also really good. 10/10
Everything is perfect here, ramen is good, popcorn chicken is amazing. Recommend 100%
Good food and drinks

Very quick service with our food & taste was amazing! Presentation was cute !

Thai ice tea was good!
Set up is nice!

We had to call the server to place our order
We had to ask for plates when our appetizer came

I‚Äôd say when two people are eating you serve them together, but my friend got her soup before I did.

Pepper condiments looks crusty
We had to call again few times after they didn‚Äôt quite check on us.

Feel like they need a female waitress to get things moving; I‚Äôd just say things tend to be different.

No soap in toilet. Needs detailed cleaning.

This is my go to ramen place in the forest hills area. I like the newly renovated decor with private booths. The service is fast and ramen is very yummy. My favorite is the kimchi ramen with just the right spice and flavor.

I‚Äôve been to all four Kyuramen locations in Queens, and one thing I truly appreciate is the consistency ‚Äî the service is always warm, the atmosphere inviting, and the quality never disappoints. Whether it‚Äôs Flushing, Bayside, Long Island City, or Forest Hills, each visit feels like coming home to a familiar, comforting meal.

My staple order is always the Yin Yang Ramen Bowl, which beautifully combines two different broths in one ‚Äî one spicy, one mild. It‚Äôs the best of both worlds. Each side is deeply flavorful, rich, and balanced, and the portions of meat and veggies are generous. The presentation is always on point, but it‚Äôs the taste that keeps me coming back.

I unfortunately suffered a loss today and grieving - honestly, there‚Äôs nothing quite like a hot, savory bowl of ramen from Kyuramen to soothe an aching heart. There‚Äôs comfort in the routine of that first sip of broth ‚Äî it‚Äôs like being wrapped in warmth and familiarity.

Kyuramen isn‚Äôt just a place to eat; it‚Äôs a small reminder that even in hard times, simple pleasures like good ramen can make things a tiny bit better.

Not only did the food come incredibly quick, but it was all full of flavor and i loved everything I had. Yes it can get pricy, especially since I ate with 2 people besides me, but we all loved it and it was worth it. The atmosphere is great as well and it was very lively inside.

I love coming here before AND after concerts at Forrest Hills Stadium. Quick and kind service, tasty food, and off the beaten path enough to not get overrun with other concert go-ers, while only being a few minutes away from the stadium.
The interior design is also SUCH a vibe!

Love this spot! The ramen is delicious, the service is super quick, and I love the unique seating inside. You get a nice sense of privacy in the elevated seating, which is nice for a date night. Also, I‚Äôm a huge fan of the ‚Äúcall‚Äù button at each table, so you don‚Äôt have to flag down people when you need something. Glad this opened in Forest Hills!
Great ramen spot, very family friendly with booths style sseats the kids love.  Kid friendly menu and things are added to the menu ever few times!
Super cheap and delicious. The waiter who served us was very friendly, he even knew a little Spanish!! I will definitely return

das restaurant ist total cool aufgebaut mit sitzpl√§tzen die bis nach oben gehen. leider gibt es nur eine einzige vegetarische ramen auswahl aber diese war sehr lecker. die br√ºhe war k√∂stlich, die zutaten ebenso. der tofu war mir pers√∂nlich zwar ein wenig zu gro√ü aber ist wirklich geschmackssache und eine pingelige bemerkung. die lila s√º√ükartoffel fries haben mich umgehauen. es war soooo lecker wirklich und vorallem einzigartig. die chili garlic edamame haben so lecker gerochen wow. leider ist nur die schale mariniert und man kann diese nicht mit essen. aber es war trotzdem sehr sehr lecker und ich kann alles nur empfehlen. nette bedienungen ebenso. thank you :)))
The atmosphere is very relaxed and great for a casual meal with friends and family. Service was fast and friendly! Food is always great üëç
My 2 kids (minors) and I moved to NJ but everytime we come visit our old neighborhood we can‚Äôt missed coming here because we are obsessed from food to service to ambience! Highly recommended 10/10

Okay, so i have been wanting to go here for the longest. A friend chose this, and I was super happy. It was worth the wait.

We got the popcorn chicken, bao bun(for her), she got the rice burger with beef... i got the fried chicken rice burger. So definitely and kind of messy, but I didn't mind haha. Also the purple sweet potato fries....top tier!! And the lemonade was delicious.

Will be back whenever I'm in that part of Queens.

I absolutely love Kyuramen! The food is always fresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented. The ramen broth is rich and comforting. You can really taste the care that goes into every bowl. The noodles have the perfect texture, and the portions are generous. The atmosphere is cozy and inviting as well!!!

This place has such a fun and cozy vibe ‚Äî I really liked the honeycomb-style decor; it gives the place a warm and modern feel. My partner and I ordered Combo B, which was a great deal and super filling. The ramen was rich and flavorful, and the sides were fresh and tasty. Definitely a nice spot for a casual date or a cozy dinner. We‚Äôll be back!
Food was great, server very friendly and awesome ambiance. Tea was nice and hot, and the side toppings very yummy.

Food was fantastic, literally everything tasted amazing. The service was the fastest I‚Äôve ever experienced. The atmosphere was so aesthetically pleasing, private pods and booths were such a cool touch. It felt nice and secluded. All of that for the price of a regular ramen place is unmatched. I‚Äôll definitely be back
My only negative review is the Thai iced tea. Not very good at all

The food is incredible you can a  bowl of ramen with two options and for the vegan people you can get a bowl of ramen with a lot of vegetables and vegetables ramen this is incredible but they upgrade their menu and it‚Äôs even better

Was In the neighborhood when I stumbled across Kyuramen. The interior was gorgeous, staff was super nice and attentive the food was excellent. I ordered the spicy ramen which blew me away, it was the closest I‚Äôve gotten in nyc to the one i had in Tokyo last year. Give this spot a try it won‚Äôt disappoint
I really love the food here the ramen is delicious and so is the Thai ice tea Kyuramen is my ramen spot !!! The best .

Ramen was tasty, the spice container was empty, and it was a little cold inside.
The chicken popcorn was served without basil but it was not bad.
I will go again
Ramen is a little salt for me but it's ok. Good service & value. Matcha pudding is very yummy

Kyuramen hits the spot for delicious and affordable ramen that's perfect for a chilly winter day! We enjoyed the variety in their menu with the Yin Yang bowl, Kyushu Spicy Tonkotsu, and Tokyo Tonkotsu Shoyu all offering unique and satisfying flavors. The ramen portions were generous and great value for the price. While the $6 combo deal (including a pork bun and Thai milk tea) is tempting, the pork bun itself was just okay.

What really stood out was the attentive service and the trendy ambiance definitely Instagram worthy! Plus, no wait time on a weekday made it a relaxed and enjoyable experience. If you're craving ramen, Kyuramen is a solid choice!

This place was great. The service was quick! The ambience and the sense of privacy awarded to you by the pods is great for a family dinner or for a date night. The food is pretty good for the price too. With lots of yummy options. Me and the family Can‚Äôt complain out of 5 stars I give it 4.75 -5 stars.  Top-notch highly recommended.

Had a really good experience here. The pricing is great for the amount of food you get and they even have a preset prices for a combo that includes a drink. The staff was very attentive as I never had to press the bell button through my whole time there. The food was delicious and the decoration is so cool and interesting. I definitely will be back to try the ramen and other dishes I really wanted to try. The mango cake was perfectly flavored and not too sweet. Can‚Äôt wait to come back!

The restaurant has a warm, welcoming vibe that immediately sets the tone for a comforting meal. The staff were attentive, quick to take orders, refill drinks, and answer questions about the menu. Ramen is extremely tasty, really I would give it 10 stars if I could!üåüüåüüåüüåüüåü

Awesome decor and excellent food! We stopped here for lunch on a weekday. Everything was delicious. Decent sized establishment that sat 6 people. A lot of the seating is private so you‚Äôre on top of other patrons. One of the most memorable decors you‚Äôll ever see. Highly recommend this place!
great atmosphere when you stepped in.  The honeycomb seating design is def unique.  The food was great and service is excellent.  Recommend for all!! Will come back for sure
Second time here. Again, in the booth. Great for kids who makes a lot of noise like mine. Super kid friendly and staff is amazing. Will be back again
I love this place! So yummy food and amazing atmosphereüòç Stuff is so polite so 10/10

The atmosphere at is undeniably charming the cozy lighting, tasteful decor, and relaxed ambiance, the setting invites you to linger. The service is friendly and attentive, enhancing the overall experience. They are not overly bothersome, only tending to you at your request.

As for the food, it‚Äôs solidly average. While there‚Äôs nothing particularly wrong with the dishes, it doesn‚Äôt stand out either. The menu has a decent variety, but the flavors don‚Äôt quite stand out from other ramen places.

If you‚Äôre looking for a spot to enjoy a pleasant environment with good company, this place fits the bill. Just don‚Äôt go in expecting a culinary revelation.

The gyoza was a dish that I enjoyed the most.
I had honeycomb platter, which was enough for one person to enjoy without any waste food. I also had strawberry mini mojito, which was good.
We went there 1 year old baby. Their  service was great and made no seasoning food for kids. I also order the miso ramen. It was great ! Not too salty it was perfect. I highly recommended it

I must say, the restaurant's architecture is truly captivating. The modern design creates a cool and inviting atmosphere that adds to the overall dining experience. The cleanliness of the environment is impeccable, making it a delightful place to enjoy a meal. The staff's friendliness further enhances the visit, providing exceptional service. Five stars for a memorable and enjoyable dining ambiance!

Pleasure of dining at KyuRamen‚Äôs Forest Hill location, and it truly surpassed my expectations. The restaurant boasts a pristine, inviting atmosphere, with modern renovations that enhance the dining experience.

About the omurice, its presentation was stunning, adding an element of ceremony to the meal, the flavor fell slightly short of expectations.

However, the miso and chashu ramen were exceptional‚Äîrich, flavorful broths that were elevated further by the addition of the Japanese spicy powder available at the table.

The seafood rice bowl also turned out to be a delightful surprise, and the matcha pudding with red beans provided the perfect conclusion to the meal. The service was impeccable, with warm, attentive staff who ensured we were comfortable throughout the visit.

Overall, Forest Hill KyuRamen offers an excellent dining experience, and I highly recommend this location for anyone seeking quality ramen and a welcoming atmosphere.

UPDATE: After another visit, I tried the fried chicken rice sandwich. I liked it! The chicken was moist and crispy with a nice sauce. The sweet potato fries are amazingly delicious. My only complaint is that the sandwich can be a bit messy (the servers provide us with disposable gloves). For me it, I had a hard time assembling the sandwich because the rice was stuck to the seaweed.

A fine place for a bowl of ramen!

We had the meal for two for $56, which I think is a good deal for what it is.

The ramen was really good! I think the spicy ramen is way better than the non-spicy. The broth wasn't as flavorful as I would like. But the noodles, pork, and garnish in the ramen bowl were delicious.

The Thai tea is refreshing and delightful.

Popcorn chicken was okay. I think it could have been crispier.

The desserts were really nice! It wasn't too sweet and it was a great end to the meal.

Service is great.

Would recommend!

I'm usually very skeptical of ramen - amount of pork and fat is frequently overwhelming. Kyuramen with it's seafood option was able to dodge that trap and combine flavor, taste and nutrition. Glad I checked this place.
They should offer an option of ice cream flavors mix. There's no reason you must have 2 scoops of the same flavor.
Got the combo for two that comes with two desserts, ramen was very good and so were the desserts. Restaurant was a cute vibe that has pretty cool seating along the walls. Would recommend!!
Delicious omurice and atmosphere. The honeycomb style seating makes it easy to chat with friends without feeling like you need to be quiet because there's no one next to you.
Literally 10/10 mins and my husbands favorite place !! We‚Äôd eat here three times a week if we could  . THAI ICED TEA IS MY ABS.FAV

I LOVE the ramen here rich, flavorful, and so comforting! üçú Every time I come, it hits the spot.

The seating setup is one of my favorite parts it‚Äôs designed like little honey hives, super creative and cozy. It gives you just enough privacy without feeling closed off. Such a fun and unique dining experience!

Had dinner with my girls,  we ordered the the takoyaki and the pork belly for the appetizer,  it was great. Then we had the combo ramen,  3 varieties of ramen,  they were all good. The popcorn chicken was part of the combo ramen,  it was delicious and the dessert too. The service was fast and  all the crew were very welcoming. Will definitely comeback.
Kyuramen Forest Hills is my go to Ramen spot in Forest Hills. The service is friendly, fast, and the food is great!
This ramen hit the spot! Amazing broth, perfect noodles, and great service. Easily one of the best bowls I‚Äôve had & it‚Äôs sooo cute inside!
